00034 void RequestHandlerReplayBegin::run() {
00035   ResponseCallback cb(m_comm, m_event_ptr);
00036   const uint8_t *decode_ptr = m_event_ptr->payload;
00037   size_t decode_remain = m_event_ptr->payload_len;
00038 
00039   try {
00040     uint16_t group = decode_i16(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00041     m_range_server->replay_begin(&cb, group);
00042   }
00043   catch (Exception &e) {
00044     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00045     cb.error(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Error handling ReplayBegin message");
00046   }
00047 }
